title: Introduction to C programming
description: this is a foundational course that provides a comprehensive overview of the C programming language.student will learn basic c.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: This is a fundamental course exploring the core principles and techniques used in designing and analyzing algorithms.student will learn basic algorithm.

title: Introduction to C++ foe DSA
description: This is a course designed to teach students the C++ programming language in the context of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA).

title: Basic Data Structures
description: This is an introductory course that covers the fundamental building blocks of data organization, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.student will learn basic data structure

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: This is a course that introduces students to the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) using the Python programming language.student will learn basic OOP.

title: Software Engineering
description: The Software Engineering course offers a comprehensive study of software development methodologies, project management, and best practices.student will learn basic Software Engineering.

title: AWS, Could Computing
description: Participants gain the skills needed to leverage AWS for scalable and cost-effective cloud solutions, making them proficient in cloud computing technologies.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: The Database (MySQL) course offers comprehensive instruction in database management using the MySQL relational database management system.student will learn basic database.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: The Problem-Solving Part of the course equips students with critical thinking and analytical skills to tackle complex challenges.student will learn basic problem solving.
